description: Returns information about the blocks in an Amazon Elastic Block Store snapshot.

parameters.name: SnapshotId
parameters.description: The ID of the snapshot from which to get block indexes and block tokens.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The token to request the next page of results. If you specify NextToken, then StartingBlockIndex is ignored.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of blocks to be returned by the request. Even if additional blocks can be retrieved from the snapshot, the request can return less blocks than MaxResults or an empty array of blocks. To retrieve the next set of blocks from the snapshot, make another request with the returned NextToken value. The value of NextToken is null when there are no more blocks to return.

parameters.name: StartingBlockIndex
parameters.description: The block index from which the list should start. The list in the response will start from this block index or the next valid block index in the snapshot. If you specify NextToken, then StartingBlockIndex is ignored.

nested_items.name: Blocks
nested_items.description: An array of objects containing information about the blocks.

nested_items.name: BlockToken
nested_items.description: The block token for the block index.

nested_items.name: ExpiryTime
nested_items.description: The time when the BlockToken expires.

nested_items.name: VolumeSize
nested_items.description: The size of the volume in GB.

nested_items.name: BlockSize
nested_items.description: The size of the blocks in the snapshot, in bytes.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to retrieve the next page of results. This value is null when there are no more results to return.
